allow: Bash(do sed -i 's/<!-- ?듯빀 硫붽?硫붾돱 -->/<!-- Integrated Mega Menu -->/g' "$file")

Bash(do sed -i 's/<!-- NEXUSGAS 而щ읆 -->/<!-- NEXUSGAS Column -->/g; s/<!-- ?ъ뾽遺꾩빞 而щ읆 -->/<!-- Business Column -->/g; s/<!-- ?붾（?섎텇??而щ읆 -->/<!-- Solutions Column -->/g; s/<!-- ?띾낫 而щ읆 -->/<!-- PR Column -->/g; s/<!-- 吏?띻??κ꼍??而щ읆 -->/<!-- Sustainability Column -->/g; s/<!-- 梨꾩슜 而щ읆 -->/<!-- Careers Column -->/g' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i 's/alarm \?\?response/alarm \& response/g; s/?듯빀 硫붽?硫붾돱/Integrated Mega Menu/g; s/NEXUS™™/NEXUS\™/g' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i 's/<a href=""#"" class=""gnb__link"" data-menu=""business"">사업분야<\/a>/<a href=""BU00.html"" class=""gnb__link"">사업분야<\/a>/g' "$file")
Bash(do sed -i '/<!-- 사업분야 컬럼 -->/,/        <\/div>/{ /<!-- 사업분야 컬럼 -->/d; /^        <div class=""mega__col"" data-col=""business"">/,/^        <\/div>$/d; }' "$file")
